name: FPS - Tower Defense
description:
This is my final project for a certificate course I took recently on "Game Development with Unity". https://goo.gl/7XivH3

I wanted to try navigation on Unity and I thought that a Tower Defense game would be perfect for that. But I thought that just Tower Defense would be too easy with all the tools Unity provides I tried to add a little of an FPS (But now that I think about it my game is actually a third person shooter). I feel satisfied with this game since it is my first game in 3D.

You need to build turrets in order to stop and destroy the waves of enemies so they cannot reach your base.

- Controls -

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Shoot: Left click while in defense mode
  • Look around with your mouse
  • Build: Left click while in build mode
  • Pause: Esc or P key
